Q_DESC:
You are given an array of positive integer numbers a1,a2...aN.
Count number of pairs (i,j) such that:
1= i  N
1 =j  N
Ai | Aj = max(Ai, Aj).
Input:

The first line contains 'T' denoting the number of testcases. Then follows description of testcases.Each case begins with a single positive integer N denoting the size of array.The second line contains N space separated positive integers denoting the elements of array.
 

Output:

For each test case, output a single line containing number of pairs for corresponding test case.

Constraints:

1=T=20
1=N=10^3
1=a[i]=10^3
